required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Awareness of Operating Room Staff About WHO OR Checklist
clinical_study.official_title: Awareness of Operating Room Staff About WHO OR Checklist

lead_sponsor.agency: Imam Mohammad ibn Saud Islamic University

clinical_study.source: Imam Mohammad ibn Saud Islamic University

brief_summary.textblock: to understand and analyze awareness of proper timing of when to sing in, time out, and sign out for patients who will be operated in Hail multidisciplinary centers, Saudi Arabia. its role in improving communication in OR, and preventing errors. how frequent not comply and potentials of non compliance. how frequent dose WHO OR check list will cause anxiety in the staff, psychological insult ,potentials to be replaced or adjusted according to each specialty needs.

primary_outcome.measure: predictive power of respondent on awareness of WHO OR checklist
primary_outcome.description: will include demographics include: gender, specialty, hospital name ,utilization of WHO OR checklist habits, commitment of staff ,communication improvement, its psychological impact over staff, significance potentials, possibility of adjustment.

study_pop.textblock: the survey link will be send to operating room staff through hospital administration, participants bio information is never requested. Informed consent was obtained from all those agreeing to complete a survey. This study was exempt from review board approval at authors' institutions.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria: operating room staff of hail region hospitals -
Exclusion Criteria: none
-

overall_official.affiliation: imam mohamamd ibn saud islamic university

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Imam Mohammad ibn Saud Islamic University
